name: @scicave/math-latex-parser
description: A mathematical parser for latex in math mode. We mean by mathematical that, arithmetic operations is considered for example if you pass "1+2", the result would by a (add node "+") with two children nodes of type number.

scripts.buildtest: npm run build && npm run test
scripts.prod: npm run lint && npm run build && npm run test
scripts.build:watch: nodemon --watch src --watch tools --watch build.js --ignore src/__tests__ --ignore src/version.js -e js,pegjs -x npm run build && npm run debug
scripts.debug:watch: nodemon --watch src --watch tools --watch build.js --watch debug.js --ignore src/__tests__ --ignore src/version.js -e js,pegjs -x npm run build && npm run debug

author: scicave
